Uploading File

Admin Login>Manage Data>Upload and Assign Data>Select service center>Select data type(Note*)>Choose file(.csv file for RE and Honda and for others .xlsx file with valid date format(yyyy/mm/dd or mm/dd/yyyy))>Submit

Note: Service Reminder - Sales data with auto calculated service due dates
Regular Data
Lost Customer Data
Job Card Data
PSF Data
AMC Data
Others
